rows.label: tlk001901_05_msg0001
rows.name: You've been to Acedia, haven't you?

rows.label: tlk001901_05_msg0002
rows.name:
What's it like there?
Is it a place where kids can be safe on their own?

rows.label: tlk001901_05_msg0003
rows.name:
The children going to the school are so excited,
you see... But not many have gone from this village,
so I can't help but worry.

rows.label: tlk001901_05_msg0004
rows.name:
I just hope it's a place where the kids
can fit in easily.
